title: City Heat
description: Candy Cravings Includes the stories: Animal Attraction by Alexa & Patrick Silver, Assignment by Nina Nash, Cheer Givers & Mischief Makers by K.Z. Snow, Discovery by Cris Anson, Heart on His Sleeve by Marissa Alwin, Screw Cupid by Arianna Hart, Soul Kisses by Aubrey Ross
author: Lacey Alexander
